thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Arnold R

author: Arnold R
title: Arnold R
text: I placed and paid for an order with Banggood. I tracked the order to the point of export by Singapore Post but it never arrived after 25 days. I registered a inquiry with the shipper but it takes a long time to get a claim resolved. I contacted Banggood and told them I hadn't received my order and asked them to ship it again. I was told that the item was out of stock and they offered a full refund which was credited back to my credit card in a few days. Incredibly, a few days later the order arrived and it was exactly the ukelele I ordered in perfect condition. I contacted Banggood and gave them the news and gave them the go-ahead to charge my credit card again. Ada, the rep at Banggood was very helpful, courteous and professional throughout the process and answered my emails promptly.
